name: Free Return Trajectory
description:
2D relaxed playground about space exploration. Many levels will be just puzzles to challenge the player but others will remember the great landmarks in space exploration's history.

The player controls the movement with the thrusters and the main engine. Fuel is always limited and sometimes, malfunctions and hazards have a predominant role in the action.

If you are a Nasa pilot, maybe this game is too easy for you!
